src:
Sederet Bocoran Oppo Reno3
07 Nov 2019, 07:56 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Foto: Gizchina

Jakarta - Reno 2 memang belum lama dirilis, tapi sang suksesor sudah dipersiapkan. Bahkan rumor spesifikasi dan fiturnya sudah mulai terungkap, apa saja?Bersumber dari postingan di Weibo, ponsel yang akan berjuluk Reno3 itu akan mengusung layar 6,5 inch dengan resolusi Full HD+. Tapi yang menarik bukan penggunaan panel AMOLED, ponsel ini bakal membawa refresh rate 90 Hz, sehingga menjanjikan transisi mulus.Reno3 bakal diotaki Snapdragon 735 SoC. Chipset ini di atas Snapdragon 730G yang metenagai Reno2. Ponsel ini kemungkinan akan dibekali LPDDR4X RAM 8 GB dengan dua pilihan memori internal 128 GB dan 256 GB.Hadir dengan empat kamera di bagian belakang. Kamera utamanya mengusung sensor baru Sony IMX686 yang menawarkan resolusi 60 MP. Lalu ada kamera 8 MP + 13 MP + 2 MP. Sementara untuk selfie diberikan kamera 32 MP dan masih menggunakan mekanisme pop-up sirip hiu.


Foto: Gizchina

Sensor sidik jari masih di layar. Pembaruan ada pada teknologi pengisian baterainya. Oppo menyertakan VOOC 4.0 30W. Kapasitas baterai Reno3 sendiri 4.500 mAh.Belum ada informasi kapan ponsel ini akan hadir. Tapi rumor menyebut harga Reno3 akan dibanderol mulai dari 3.299 yuan atau sekitar Rp 6,6 juta. Simak Video "Resmi Dirilis, Berapa Harga OPPO Reno 2 Series? "[Gambas:Video 20detik](afr/afr)
text:
A row of Leaks Oppo Reno3
Nov 7 2019, 07:56 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Photo: Gizchina

Jakarta - Reno 2 was released not too long ago, but the successor has been prepared. Even the rumors of specifications and features have started to be revealed, what? Sourced from posts on Weibo, the cellphone that will be nicknamed Reno3 will carry a 6.5 inch screen with Full HD + resolution. But what's interesting is not the use of AMOLED panels, this phone will bring a refresh rate of 90 Hz, so it promises a smooth transition.Reno3 will be controlled by Snapdragon 735 SoC. This chipset is on the Snapdragon 730G which is powered by Reno2. This phone is likely to be equipped with 8GB LPDDR4X RAM with two choices of 128GB and 256GB internal memory. Comes with four cameras on the back. The main camera carries the new sensor Sony IMX686 which offers a resolution of 60 MP. Then there's an 8 MP + 13 MP + 2 MP camera. As for selfies, a 32 MP camera is provided and the shark fin pop-up mechanism is still used.


Photo: Gizchina

Fingerprint sensor still on screen. The update is on the battery charging technology. Oppo includes VOOC 4.0 30W. The capacity of the Reno3 battery itself is 4,500 mAh. There is no information when this phone will be present. But rumors say the price of Reno3 will be priced starting at 3,299 yuan. Check out the video "Officially Released, How much is OPPO Reno 2 Series?" [Gambas: Video 20second] (afr / afr)
